name: The clown fish
trivia: Do you know the animators of "Finding nemo" studied dogs’ facial expressions and eyes to animate the fishes’ expressions?

name: Butterfly fish
trivia: Do you know there are 114 species of butterfly fish?

name: Gold fish
trivia: Do you know gold fishes can recognize faces?

name: Tiger barb
trivia: Tiger barbs can swim fast and  they like to spend their time by chasing other tiger barbs.

name: Squid
trivia: Some species of squid can swim at speeds up to 25 miles per hour, as fast as some sharks.

name: Octopus
trivia: Do you know octopuses have 3 hearts and they have blue blood?

name: Angel fish
trivia: Do you know if an angelfish's partner dies, then it has no interest in finding another partner?

name: Crab
trivia: Do you know a crab's eyestalks can move in different directions which allow it to see all around?

name: Star fish
trivia: Do you know starfishes have 2 stomachs and can regenerate their arms.

name: Carp fish
trivia: Do you know carp fish can grow very big? The largest carp on record weighs 222lbs.

name: Electric fish
trivia: Electric fishes have large brain-to-body size ratios and can use their electric discharge to communicate social status

name: Discus fish
trivia: Discus fish is a perhaps the most beautiful tropical fish and known as the King of the Aquarium

name: Betta fish
trivia: Most Betta fish in aquariums are red and blue in color. But, wild bettas are brown or green.

name: Sea horse
trivia: Did you know the male sea horse bears the unborn young? This is rare in the animal kingdom.

name: Sea environment
trivia: Sea is a new level. You can unlock new fishes for the sea.

name: Blue tang
trivia: If you are a shark, never eat blue tang fish. Blue tang is Paracanthurus hepatus, a poisonous fish.

name: Jelly fish
trivia: Do you know jellyfish have been on Earth for millions of years, even before dinosaurs?

name: Green Crab
trivia: A carb's shell protects the soft abdomen, and hydrates the gills so that it can breathe well.

name: Red Crab
trivia: Do you know a crab somtimes wants another crab's shell, then a shell fight triggers?

name: Achovies
trivia: Anchovies are found in temperate waters, and are rare in very cold or very warm seas.

name: Bubbles
trivia: Bubbles is in the fishtank gang. Like a playful puppy obsessed with a toy, he is enamored with bubbles.

name: Salmon
trivia: Do you know salmons can jump two yards into the air?

name: Deep undersea fish
trivia: Deepsea fishes live below 1000 meter of the sea level where no sunlight can reach. They can generate light biologically

name: Sword fish
trivia: Do you sword fishes can swim up to 60 miles per hour

name: Shark
trivia: Do you most sharks species will drown if they stop moving?

name: Dophin
trivia: Dolphins communicate with each other by clicking, whistling and other sounds.

name: Whale
trivia: Do you know that many whales are toothless?

name: Stingray fish
trivia: Ancient Greeks extracted venom from stingray spines and use it as an anaesthetic.
